title: WHO, ITU, WIPO release a new technical brief on using AI in traditional medicine
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is ushering in a transformative era for traditional medicine, one where centuries-old healing systems are enhanced by cutting-edge technologies to deliver more safe, personalized, effective, and accessible care.
content:

title: Smishing scams are on the rise made easier by artificial intelligence, new tech
description: Canadian Anti-Fraud Centre says smishing is increasing with help from AI tools that craft convincing messages or scour data from security breaches
content:
